Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.core.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Coordinates user input, game board state updates, scoring, and UI events. Acts as the mediator between input events, core logic, and the GUI layer.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eashwar
